name: Game Jam Jitters
description:
This game is a submission for the "dreams" theme for Godot Wild Jam 55. The game was developed with Godot 4.0. I have opted for the "A Fork in the Road" wildcard. The game has two different endings.

Art Assets:

  • AxulArt (https://axulart.itch.io/axularts-basic-top-down-interior)
  • Game-icons.net (https://game-icons.net/)
  • Grahhhhh (https://opengameart.org/content/computer)
  • H0ndred (https://h0ndred.itch.io/mini-interior-asset-pack-bedroom-bathroom)
  • Kenney (https://kenney.nl/)
  • Molly "Cougarmints" Willits (https://opengameart.org/content/simple-notebook-paper)
  • ShatteredReality (https://shatteredreality.itch.io/schoolgirl-sidescroller-sprite)

Audio Assets:

  • Kenney (https://kenney.nl/)

Font:

  • DejaVu (https://dejavu-fonts.github.io/)
